lead_paragraph: American regulators approved a new once-daily pill for the liver-destroying virus made by Merck, which said it would sell the drug at a lower list price than its competitors.

headline.main: Hepatitis C Drug From Merck Is Approved

snippet: American regulators approved a new once-daily pill for the liver-destroying virus made by Merck, which said it would sell the drug at a lower list price than its competitors.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration approves hepatitis C drug Zepatier made by Merck; price is $54,600 for 12-week regimen.
